title: Setup
extract: Whether we like it or not, much of our language is now heavily influenced by American English spellings. Hence, 'setup' is used when talking of initiating computer programs, but, in any other sense, we use the verb (doing word) 'to set up' and the noun from that verb 'the set-up'.
extract_html: Whether we like it or not, much of our language is now heavily influenced by American English spellings. Hence, 'setup' is used when talking of initiating computer programs, but, in any other sense, we use the verb (doing word) 'to set up' and the noun from that verb 'the set-up'.
